name: Rabbit Hay Feeder Bag for Guinea Pigs and Chinchillas | Chew Proof Washable Oxford Cloth Hay Rack, Timothy Hay Holder, Hanging Double Hole Black Oxford Cloth
short_description: Universal Small Pet Use – Works as a hay feeder bag for rabbits, guinea pigs, chinchillas, and even hamsters. Versatile design fits most small-animal habitats and keeps feeding organized.
Cleaner Feeding, Less Waste – Compared with open hay racks, this hay bag design keeps hay neat, reduces mess, and prevents waste. Perfect for timothy or alfalfa hay.

Easy to Hang and Use – Measuring 11 × 10 × 2.8 inches (28 × 26 × 7 cm), this feeder comes with adjustable straps and metal grommets that mount securely in seconds. Front openings allow pets to nibble hay comfortably from cages, hutches, or playpens.
Durable and Pet-Safe – Made from strong oxford cloth with reinforced stitching and smooth edges, this hay bag is chew-resistant, safe for daily use, and built to last through frequent refills.
Convenient Refill & Portable – Top-loading design makes refilling fast and easy. The hay bag folds flat for compact storage or travel, ensuring a reliable feeding solution at home or on the go.

Ensuring a Neat and Tidy Setting: These Hay Feeder Rabbit are crafted for convenient hay access, encouraging rabbits to nibble naturally and ensuring a consistent food supply. With a narrower gap compared to other hay holder, this hay rack blanket holder ensures rabbits or smaller animals won't get their heads stuck. This Bunny Hay Holder promotes a cleaner cage environment, enhance confortable feelings for your rabbit.

Clean Environment Comfortable Living: You have the option to hang the hay holder for rabbit cage or place it on the ground. Hanging or attaching the rabbit hay feeder to the cage conserves floor space, creating a more comfortable living area for the rabbit. A cleaner feeding environment leads to fewer health concerns, decreasing the risk of living issues or problems in rabbits by minimizing exposure to falling hay.

Package Included: You will receive 1x Guinea Pig Hay Feeder, with 2x strong hanging hooks and 6x straps to enhance its stability. short_description: Metal Material: This small animal hay rack is made of high quality and durable metal material, after multiple processes such as welding, grinding and spraying. The distance between the fine wires is moderate, the back and the bottom are made of metal plate, which ensures that the metal hay rack won't leak the hay during the process of using. The surface is smooth and burr-free, which won't cause any harm to the small animals, and it creates a relaxing, clean, and safe feeding environment.

Perfect Lid：When ordinary rabbit feeders are in use, active bunnies jump into the Hay Feeder, which not only contaminates the hay, but also poses an uncertain danger. Adding a perfect lid to the basket avoids these problems, and also greatly increases the capacity of the rabbit feeder and reduces the waste of grass.

Easy to Fasten：In order to fix the pet feeder on various irregular feeding cages, Bunny Feeder with hook design, simply attach it to the cage bars. The package also comes with 2 metal mountaineering buckles and 4 black tie straps, even without using the hooks on the hay rack, the feeding basket can be easily fixed, solving your mounting and fixing hassles.

Wide Range of Applications：Pet grass feeder clever design can be used in most cages. Size: 6.89 x 4.72 x 7.09 inches. Large capacity design ensures that there is enough hay in the hay rack without the need to add it multiple times, suitable for most small animals such as rabbits, guinea pigs, chinchillas, and other similarly sized herbivorous pets.

Keeping Pets Happy：Our hay holder hangs on the cage wall, which not only reduces the waste of hay and keeps the pet cage clean and tidy, but also doesn't take up the limited space of the cage. Which ensures that the pets have a large enough space to play, romp and sleep, so that the little animals can enjoy the fun of food and grow up carefree in a clean and comfortable environment.
